rationale: Change Activity Planner Edit Task requires a license for Oracle Database Lifecycle Management Pack to use.
recommended_action:
Disable unneeded Packs in Grid Control: https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E63000_01/OEMLI/introduction.htm#OEMLI108
This should be checked every time a new target is added to Grid Control since many Packs are defaulted to "Enabled"
error_message: Change Activity Planner Edit Task is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Database Lifecycle Management Pack
